on the plane. Moreover,we also give closed formulae for this variance on particular types of graphs in bothlinear arrangements and general layouts\u00a7r

§72020§r

Comments: \u00a77\u00a7oIt has come to the attention ofthe author that the mainresult of the contribution can readily be obtained by combining existing results. Graphs with minimum degree 3 and large enough girth have a 2d-shallow minor of
minimum degree at least 2^d. Moreover, the edge density in shallow minors of k-planar graphs is polynomial for any fixed k (and thus for k = 1)\u00a7r
